sentences: Awareness  is the experience of that consciousness being awakened . The individual aspect of the ALL becomes aware of Itself .
Beingness  is a state in which you place yourself , it is not a response . " Feeling " is a response , but " being " is not .
Feeling good  is your way of telling yourself that your last thought was truth , your last action was love .
Nothing ventured , nothing gained  is not just a nifty old-time saying . It's wisdom . Listen to it .
Your life is not about you  - That little statement changed my life . It turned everything upside down . Or more accurately , right side up .
“ Now ” is simply overwhelmed by “ Then . ” Today becomes deeply mired in Yesterday .
A commitment to meditation is a commitment to your soul , to be with your soul , meet your soul , listen to your soul .
A conversation is not a " conversation " if it's a monologue . Voices that differ are voices that enlarge the scope of every conversation .
A genius is not one who creates an answer , but who discovers that the answer has always been there .
A good cry can be wonderful sometimes , and sadness is nothing more than love announced .
A knowledge and an experience of your real self , of who you really are . Go after that , and all the rest will follow .
A lack of understanding is your own creation ; it is , literally , a figment of your imagination .
A life lived by choice is a life of conscious action . A life lived by chance is a life of unconscious reaction .
A little more willingness to acknowledge that there may be something you do not know could change everything .
A negative attitude will send you down the road to unhappiness . A positive attitude will put you back on The Path to inner peace & happiness .
A negative attitude will send you down the road to unhappiness . There is no avoiding it .
A positive attitude will put you back on The Path to inner peace and happiness . There is no avoiding it .
A smile actually changes the vibe of your body . It alters , physiologically , the chemistry of your being .
Affirmations work only when they are statements of something you already know to be true .
All change is for the better . The mind reject such notions , but the soul shouts them to high heaven .
All conditions are temporary . Nothing stays the same . Which way a thing changes depends on you .
All conflict arises from misplaced desire . The only peace in all the world that is sustaining is Internal Peace .
All learning is remembering . All teaching is reminding . All lessons are memories , recaptured .
All of life is a gift . When you understand this , you will remain in a state of continual appreciation .
All of life is a process of creation - creating ourselves anew in the next grandest version ever we had about ourselves .
All of life is deciding . You are deciding , with every truth you embrace , every thought you birth , Who You Are .
All of life is Divine , and when we treat all of life as Divine we change everything .
All of life is spiritual , and therefore all of life's problems are spiritually based , and spiritually solved .
All systems which reduce , restrict , or eliminate freedom in any way are systems which work against life itself .
All things are living . There is no such thing as a Dead Thing .
All things are One Thing , and there is nothing else . " We Are All One " is a precise description of the nature of Ultimate Reality .
All things lead us to our innermost truth . That is their purpose . Life is truth , revealing Itself to Itself .
All things that have ever happened , are happening Now , and ever will happen , are occurring in this moment .
All truth is subjective . The truth is not discovered , it is created . It is not observed , it is produced .
All you have to do is know that this is true , and it will be true for you , right now . I think that's terrific , don't you ?
All you really have to do to change your thought about something is to Think Twice .
All you see in your world is the outcome of your idea about it . Cynicism , defensiveness and fear have kept many from their " highest thoughts . "
Allow yourself to call forth all the joy & wonder that life can bring you , in whatever form you happily choose .
Allow yourself to call forth all the joy and wonder that life can bring you , in whatever form you happily choose !
Allow yourself to notice that you are just as you need to be , just when you need to be , in order to move forward the agenda of your Soul .
Always remember that we are three part beings , made up of Body , Mind , and Soul .
Always , with your choices , you are answering a single question : Who am I ? Every act is an act of self-definition .
An event and your reality about that event are not the same thing . An event is one thing ; your reality of it is another .
Are you happy ? Are you compassionate and considerate of others ? It is who you have been , not what you have done , that matters to your soul .
Are you in a place called fear , or in a place called love ? Where are you , and where are you coming from , as you encounter life ?
Are you meditating regularly ? Is it the first thing you cut out of your day if things begin to get hectic ? It should be the last thing .
Are you willing to overcome your daily minor obstacles ? Look to see what they offer you in terms of growth , and you'll see their treasure .
As a Spiritual Being , I know that I am here for a spiritual reason . My purpose has to do with my interior life .
As it relates to you , perfection is the Self that you have chosen to be , and are now choosing to demonstrate & experience .
As long as you think you can win an argument , you will have it . As long as you think you can win a war , you will fight it .
As soon as you decide to Be something , you then decide to do something about it .
As you evolve into higher states of consciousness , you bring into full realization every aspect of your being .
As you shift and change your own experience , the experience of the whole human race begins to shift and change as well .
At every moment of difficulty in your life you have a choice : you can oppose what you are experiencing , or compose what you choose .
At the end of your life you will know that nothing you have done will matter - only who you have been while you have done it .
At the end of your life you will see that it is who you have been , not what you have done , that matters to your soul .
Awareness is noticing at a very high level of consciousness exactly what is happening Right Here , Right Now .
Be a bringer of the Light . For your light can do more than illuminate your own path , you can be the light which truly lights the world .

Be shameless about love . Get the shame out of it , and replace it with celebration .
Because the Journey has been described as “ sacred ” does not mean that one cannot seek and find pleasure and excitement in worldly pursuits .
Behold the darkness , yet curse it not . Rather , be a light unto the darkness , and so transform it . Let your light shine .

Bring a gentle wisdom to your moments . Watch it change them . Watch it change you .
Bring peace to the Earth by bringing peace to all those whose lives you touch . Be peace .
Bring yourself to the present moment by just listening to your breath . Then quietly , give yourself permission to make a new choice if you wish .
Built into you is an internal guidance system that shows you the way home . All you need to do is heed the voice .
Celebrate the shifting sands as they form the new mountains . These mountains are monuments to change , not to permanence .

Change is the fundamental impulse of Life itself . It is the continual , unending adjustment , adaptation , and alteration of All That Is .
Change your ideas about the changes to come , even as you change your idea about the changes that have passed .
Change your mind about what you hold in mind about the world . Think of moments of splendor , expressions of love .
Changing something is not resisting something , it is merely choosing again . Modification is creation .
Changing what you imagine to be needs into what you experience as desires is the first step towards mastery .
Completely rearrange your thinking about Earth . Begin to experience life “ on Earth as it is in heaven . ” That is , as if this were a paradise .
Compose your original idea of how you want life to show up . And compose yourself too . Be assured that life is functioning perfectly .

Could you go so far as to create a brand new truth about yourself ? Truth is created , it is not discovered .

Decide Who You Are - Who you want to be - and then do everything in your power to be that .
Divinity realized through any other person , place or thing is Divinity by Projection
Do not allow yourself to be defined by default . If you think you are making no decision by making no decision , you are making a mistake .
Do not attempt to change another , BE the change you wish to see . That is your mission , and there is no other .
Do not berate or beleaguer yourself for “ not doing it right ” as you move through your days and times .
Do not buy into what others are telling you -- even if those others are people in authority , people who seem to have all the information .
Do not condemn all you would call bad in the world . Ask yourself what about this you've judged bad , and what do you wish to do to change it .
Do not confuse excellence with perfection . The first is possible to achieve , the second is probably not .
Do not jump into " reaction " mode at the first appearance of negative energy . Just breathe , and relax .
Do not look for your Master , BE the Master for whom you have been looking .
Do not search for life's meaning , or the meaning of any particular event , occurrence , or circumstance . Give it its meaning .
Do not search for life's meaning . Give it its meaning . Then announce and declare Who You Choose to Be .
Do not tarry in doubt and fear , yet reside in permanent splendor in the assurance that you are grandly loved .
Do not tie your efforts at personal transformation to a result called planetary transformation , or you may achieve neither .
Do not try to " do " happy . Simply choose to " be " happy , and everything you do will spring from that .
Do not try to solve all the mysteries . Give the universe a chance . It will unfold itself in due course . Enjoy the experience of becoming .
Do some critical thinking , and not just memorizing what others want you to think .
Do you think you are a messenger ? You are . You are bringing a message TO life , ABOUT life , through the process of Life Itself .
Don't decry the " effort that failed . " All things lead to your highest good . You just may not know it yet .
Don't take yourself so seriously . Give yourself a little slack . And while you're at it , give each other a little , too .
Don't worry about " mistakes . " Rather , worry about being afraid not to make any .
Don't worry about you . Your life will be taken care of . Worry about everyone whose life you touch that doesn't know this .
Don't you dare give up on Tomorrow because of the way things look Today . Don't even think about it .

Drop fear by the wayside . Just . . . let it go . Then make way for a surprising tomorrow .

Even our most difficult moments bring us gifts .

Every decision you make-every decision-is not a decision about what to do . It's a decision about Who You Are .

Face the future fearlessly , understanding the process and seeing the perfection of all of it .
Failure is a fiction , every trying is a success & every effort achieves the victory .

Let your task , your greatest joy be to give people back to themselves . Even in their darkest hour . Especially in that hour .

Life is an ongoing , never-ending process of re-creation . This is the purpose of all life .
Life is beautiful . It’s just a matter of seeing it that way .

Life is not a process of discovery , it is a process of creation .
Life is nothing but energy ; pure energy that circles back into itself .
Life is the expression of Divinity in , through , and as Us , and the experience of heaven on earth .
